duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete initial claim set-up and assignment, gather technical details to assist adjusters in shortening the life cycle of claims.
Provide clerical support to claims adjusters, update claims in database, contact brokers, screen incoming phone calls, and prepare written correspondence.
Retrieve and work general voice mailbox, process mail, prioritize workload, and gather technical information through ordering reports and contacting police departments.
Responsible for telephone calls from various parties, demonstrate passion for strong claim management, and have an eagerness to learn the Triage claim's function.
Operate within a standard office environment using a PC and other office equipment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree from an accredited university, high-level knowledge of Service Center policies and guidelines typically achieved through 1 year of commercial insurance experience.
